title: 1Dq
author: 1Dq
content: I'm happy to put on auction one of my key crypto pieces, an amalgam of many ideas - The Bitcoin Miner The Bitcoin Miner, 2018, Acrylics and Gold on Canvas, Framed, 111x91cm/43,7”x35,8” Bid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.08 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.005 BTCAuction End Time: Thursday, November 30st, 2023 @23:59:59 CET  countdown clock: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20231130T00&p0=736&msg=Auction+end&font=sanserif&csz=1Sniping:  15 minute standard sniping rule - Any bid made within the last 15 minutes of the auction, will restart a 15 minute clock for each bid thereafter.Shipping: Paid for by buyer. Ships from Europe. Buyer responsible for any and all customs/duties. Seller is responsible for packaging cost! Payment Address: 1Dqt8AsKaRdaWNqruPmUkqseqLm9YXZaPPayment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer...The Bitcoin Miner, 2018, Acrylics and Gold on Canvas, Framed, 111x91cm/43,7”x35,8” + a few shots from up close.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: This has to be my all time favorite painting ever made!! Great job on the concept and the outcome and of course goodluck on your auction!

comments.author: anonymousminer
comments.body: I own (2) 1Dq originals.  Great artist and easy to work with.  I'm out of wall space so good luck with this one!!

comments.author: 1Dq
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on November 06, 2023, 04:48:14 PM This has to be my all time favorite painting ever made!! Great job on the concept and the outcome and of course goodluck on your auction!Quote from: anonymousminer on November 06, 2023, 06:07:40 PMI own (2) 1Dq originals.  Great artist and easy to work with.  I'm out of wall space so good luck with this one!!Thanks for your support, legends of this board!

comments.author: 1Dq
comments.body: *Half way there BUMP*Bitcoin Miner isn't shy in any context. I've tried out a couple different ones.And the coin knows how to take the spotlight.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: one of my favorite pieces of yours. but way out of my range. a great piece for whoever wins!

comments.author: Vispilio
comments.body: Interesting no one bid on this yet, it's definitely an impressive piece of original art. I would suggest turning at least some of your work into NFT's and launching a collection, I think you would get some sponsors with the high quality of your work, and definitely reach a wider audience; also millenials and digital nomads who are very economical with physical space might actually prefer owning the NFT version...

comments.author: 1Dq
comments.body: Quote from: Vispilio on November 28, 2023, 10:54:19 PMInteresting no one bid on this yet, it's definitely an impressive piece of original art. I would suggest turning at least some of your work into NFT's and launching a collection, I think you would get some sponsors with the high quality of your work, and definitely reach a wider audience; also millenials and digital nomads who are very economical with physical space might actually prefer owning the NFT version... I think anyone interested might be waiting for the last minutes so they wouldn't start the bidding thing yet. We'll see!As for NFT's, this was already done. I should have made more fuss about it, but i was a bit busy with other projects at the time (I honestly almost forgot about these a couple of times haha)

comments.author: 1Dq
comments.body: AUCTION ended.No bids at this occasion, see you next time.Cheers.
